_header: Words been so knit with sin
_description: Sin and speech go together — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Wordes ben so knit with sinneTis strong to knowen a þouth
                    withinneGo to treuthe & dem orithÞat senne hat tunge &
                    hertis mith
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 14.
